data.title: Gerald 'Gerry' Anderson Obituary 2016
data.meta_description: Gerry Anderson, 71, of Beaufort, previously of Illinois, passed away Saturday August 13, 2016 at his home.   Gerry was well known as a custom fishing rod builder.  Gerry was a V...
data.text: Gerry Anderson, 71, of Beaufort, previously of Illinois, passed away Saturday August 13, 2016 at his home. Gerry was well known as a custom fishing rod builder. Gerry was a Vietnam combat veteran serving at the rank of Sargent as a field artillery observer in the US Army. Gerry was a life time member of the Veterans of Foreign Wars. A gathering of friends will be held from 1:00 to 3:00 PM Saturday August 27, 2016 at Bridgeway Church of Beaufort, with Military Honors at 1:00 PM. He is preceded in death by his parents, Robert and Dorothy Anderson; wife, Vick Anderson; two brothers, Kenneth and Robert Anderson. Condolences and life tributes may be sent to the family at www.noefs.org Arrangements by Noe Funeral Service, Inc. of Beaufort, NC. You are using an outdated web browser that does not support this video. Your browser does not support this video format. You should be able to view it in Chrome, Safari or Internet Explorer. Service Information Gathering of Family and Friends Saturday August 27, 2016 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM Bridgeway Church 100 Lockhart Dr. Beaufort, NC 28516
